name: personal-dashboard
description: A minimalist, static personal dashboard with YAML-based configuration

scripts.dev: npm run sync-config && npm-run-all --parallel watch:config dev:vite
scripts.watch:config: chokidar 'config/dashboard.yaml' -c 'cp config/dashboard.yaml public/dashboard.yaml && cp config/dashboard.yaml slate-config/dashboard.yaml'
scripts.sync-config: cp config/dashboard.yaml public/dashboard.yaml && cp config/dashboard.yaml slate-config/dashboard.yaml
